description: Wouldn't it be nice to have more hands?
A /b/toolbelt/b/ isn't quite extra hands, but it does help lighten the load. A simple belt can be /6/crafted from just string/6/.
The /b/Rope belt/b/ starts with a single /b/Leather Strap/b/, capable of holding /6/one quickslot/6/.

/6/Sneak/6/ and press /b/B/b/ (by default) to /6/insert your held item/6/ into the slot. Hold /b/B/b/ to /6/select a quickslotted item/6/. Press /b/Alt+B/b/ to open it as an inventory, allowing acess to any /b/Storage Pouches/b/.

The rope belt has /c/poor intergrity/c/ and thus cant hold many other utilities, but it can be /6/upgraded with more strength/6/. An /b/upgraded belt/b/ can hold more /b/Straps/b/, /b/Storage Pouches/b/, /b/Quivers/b/, and even a /b/jet Booster/b/.
